summary: This is Sylgja made into a recruitable follower and she is a spellsword class.
descriptionHtml:
Hello here\'s my first mod, the beautiful Sylgja with better hair, looks and she is a powerful follower.

[size=2]
[list]
Race: Nord
Class: Spellsword
Level: Auto-level to player level (no cap)
Essential NPC
Spells: Fire/Frost//Lightning/Healing/Ward
Perks: Magic Resistance30, Augmented Flames, Augmented Frost, Regeneration, Respite, Recovery50
Faction: Follower, Marriage
[/list]
[/size]

[color=dodgerblue]Location:[/color] Shor\'s Stone
[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Shor%27s_Stone] Shor\'s Stone [/url]
[color=dodgerblue]
     -Two versions to choose from[/color]
        
        -Sylgja_1.3: Normal version with all her spells learned
        
        -Sylgja_1.3_No spells: No spells learned to ensure compatibility
         with follower mods that can teach spells.
         

[color=dodgerblue][size=3]
Installation: [/color][/size]
Open the file archive and extract the content into Skyrim\\Data
Activate Sylgja.esp in the launcher or with NMM

[color=dodgerblue][size=3]Changelog:[/color][/size]

[color=dodgerblue][b]Version 1.1:[/b][/color]
     -Fixed the dark NPC face skin bug, the facegen had saved references to an incorrect textures for the face.

[color=dodgerblue][b]Version 1.2:[/b][/color]
     -Reapplied bugfix for npc face
     -Removed Fireball spell and added Lightning bolt spell
     -Changed AI type to Human Magic now uses varied spells and melee and fixes Idling AI bug
     -Minimum level=10 to help on her stats early levels
     -Speed +50%

[color=dodgerblue][b]Version 1.3:[/b][/color]
     -NPC rebuild from scratch on Skyrim patch 1.7
     -Standalone, uses .BSA file for easier installation, No requirements to install
     -No default clothes
     -Two version to choose from, no spells learned and regular caster type
     -New hairstyle, face, eyes


[color=dodgerblue][size=4]Stats - Health Magicka Stamina Scaling fix:[/size][/color]
All followers have this bug, but to scale their stats, HP/Mag should have raised to match her level.

Open console
Click the NPC and enter these 3 lines

[size=3]
setclass 0010F7F9
disable
enable
[/size]


[color=dodgerblue]Credits[/color]
CBBE by Caliente
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
XCE - Brows by Xenius
CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal by navetsea
The Eyes Of Beauty by LogRaam
author: GRIMELEVEN
